      • getSchema

        public static javax.xml.validation.Schema getSchema(java.io.File schema_file)
                                             throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                    java.lang.NullPointerException
        Convenience function for getting an XML schema for validation from the file schema_file.
        Parameters:
        schema_file - The file containing the xml schema.
        Returns:
        A javax.xml.validation.Schema object created from schema_file
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - thrown by SchemaFactory.newSchema
        java.lang.NullPointerException - thrown by SchemaFactory.newSchema

      • getSchema

        public static javax.xml.validation.Schema getSchema(java.lang.String xsd_name)
        Read the xsd file and return a new xml Schema instance from it.
        Parameters:
        xsd - A string containing the URI for the xml schema file.
        Returns:
        An xml Schema object for the schema described in xsd.

        Parameters:
        element - The element to search from.

      • getSimpleElementText

        public static java.lang.String getSimpleElementText(org.w3c.dom.Element node,
                                    java.lang.String name)
        Return the string data contained in the node with tag == name under the Element node.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to search under.
        name - The tagname for the element we are looking for.
        Returns:
        A String containing the text in the first Element under node that has tagname == name.

      • getSimpleElementText

        public static java.lang.String getSimpleElementText(org.w3c.dom.Element node)
        Get the text content of the text element node.
        Parameters:
        node - A text element we want to extract the value of.
        Returns:
        A string containing the text read from node.

      • createDocument

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document createDocument(java.lang.String xml_name,
                                  java.lang.String xsd_name)
        Verify an xml document according to a schema, and parse the xml to create a Dom.
        Parameters:
        xml - Name of the file containing the xml.
        xsd - Name of the file containing the xml schema.
        Returns:
        A document created by the parser from the xml file.

      • formatDoc

        public static java.lang.String formatDoc(org.w3c.dom.Document dom)
        Create and return a formatted string of xml from the supplied dom.
        Parameters:
        dom - The Dom we want to convert to a formatted xml string.
        Returns:
        A string containing reasonably formatted xml.

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document createEmptyDom(java.lang.String xsd)
        Create an empty DOM document that conforms to the schema file xsd.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        An empty xml DOM Document.
